--- title: "California Transit Payments" order: 200 --- ## Setting up R Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(skimr) library(ggformula) library(correlation) # library(sjPlot) library(sjlabelled) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ## Introduction This dataset is the result of a research study on payment options for people using public transit in California. The dataset is available on Dataset Dryad: Pike, Susan (2022). *Transit payment preferences of unbanked passengers.* Dataset Dryad. and a brief 2-pager on the research methodology is [here](https://rosap.ntl.bts.gov/view/dot/61204/dot_61204_DS1.pdf). ## Read the Data ::: {.cell} ::: ## Inspect and Clean the Data ::: {.cell} ::: ## Data Dictionary ::: callout-note ### Quantitative Variables Write in. ::: ::: callout-note ### Qualitative Variables Write in. ::: ::: callout-note ### Observations Write in. ::: ## Analyse the Data ::: {.cell} ````{.cell-code} ```{{r}} #| label: data-preprocessing # # Write in your code here # to prepare this data as shown below # to generate the plot that follows ``` ```` ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 204 Select and Transform the variables as shown. Create the graph shown below and discuss the following questions: - Identify the type of charts - Identify the variables used for various geometrical aspects (x, y, fill...). Name the variables appropriately. - What activity might have been carried out to obtain the data graphed here? Provide some details. - What would be your recommendation to the Transport Company? - To the Phone Companies?
